rules_text:
Chosen one [i]({W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Transform this permanent.)[/i]
When Keeper of Holy Lands enters, you may search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
rules_text2:
Flying
Whenever a nontoken, noncreature, nonland permanent you control enters, create a token that's a copy of that permanent except it has no mana cost and it isn't legendary.
